channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 09:32 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv region
item.description: 🟡 09:32 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv region#m_harkiv_tha_tha_harkiv_harkivska_harkivska_harkiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
